mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (USERNAME, EMAIL, PASSWORD, BIO, PROFILE_PICTURE, CREATED_AT) VALUES (#{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{bio}, #{profilePicture}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT USERNAME, EMAIL, PASSWORD, BIO, PROFILE_PICTURE, CREATED_AT FROM users WHERE USERNAME = #{username}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET USERNAME = #{username}, EMAIL = #{email}, PASSWORD = #{password}, BIO = #{bio}, PROFILE_PICTURE = #{profilePicture} WHERE id = #{id}
